Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-2EB  (Natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Edible frog,Pelophylax esculentus (Rana esculenta), Europe; also found in skin secretions,Rana ridibunda, Asia (see AP1899 ref)

Literature Information.Literature: It inhibited the growth of S. aureus and K. pneumoniae (inhibition zone assay). Found in multiple species. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Simmaco M, Mignogna G, Barra D, Bossa F.1994
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from skin secretions of Rana esculenta. Molecular cloning of cDNAs encoding esculentin and brevinins and isolation of new active peptides.
